charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Pakura (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Pakura (S) was a revered shinobi of the Hidden Sand in the past. So much so that she was revived against her will to participate in the fourth shinobi world war.

abilities.name: Scorch Release
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Pakura (S) uses Scorch Release on one enemy dealing 20 affliction damage. The following 2 turns if any enemy uses a skill on Edo Tensei Pakura (S) they will be dealt 10 affliction damage. Steaming Murder can be used for 2 turns when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Searing Combat
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Pakura (S) targets one enemy dealing 20 affliction* damage for 2 turns. This skill cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.

abilities.name: Steaming Murder
abilities.description: Using Steaming Murder Edo Tensei Pakura (S) deals 40 affliction damage to one enemy.

abilities.name: Experienced Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Pakura (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
